com.bsandersen.CabConverter
Class CabrilloLine

java.lang.Object
  com.bsandersen.CabConverter.CabrilloLine

public class CabrilloLine
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains all the information for a given line of text (not a QSO line) within a Cabrillo file.

Author:
B. Scott Andersen (NE1RD)

Constructor Detail

CabrilloLine

public CabrilloLine()
Method Detail

addElement

public void addElement(java.lang.String elementType,
                       java.lang.String elementValue)
addElement adds the essence of the element to the QSO description. If the element is a Text item, the type "Text" and the text element's value is added. If the element is a reference to some data item, then the data item like "Frequency" is added.

Parameters:
elementType - The type of the element (text or list).
elementValue - The value for the element from the XML description.

value

public java.lang.String value()
This method will produce the expanded string value for the line using the details from the XML file and the values from the various elements of the UI.

Returns:
The rendered line after expansion of keywords.

getNext

public final CabrilloLine getNext()
Getter

Returns:
the next line description from the recipe

setNext

public final void setNext(CabrilloLine next)
Setter

Parameters:
next - the next line description element to be remembered

isQsoPlaceholder

public final boolean isQsoPlaceholder()
Query

Returns:
is this element the QSO placeholder/specifier?

setQsoPlaceholder

public final void setQsoPlaceholder(boolean isQsoPlaceholder)
Setter

Parameters:
isQsoPlaceholder - is the answer to the question, "is this a QSO placeholder?"
